name: Space Slash
description:
CHROME AND EDGE USERS!
If your screen is black after pushing "Run Game" wait. The game is loading and the loading bar is not showing for some reason. You can also download demo.

Soldier!

You're pilot of starship. You agreed to perform suicide mission of assault on enemy territory.

Destroy Enemies to gain points, and don't miss yellow canisters for cheap gains!

Also, Your fuel is your health for some reason soo keep your eye on that pesky green bar and catch green canisters with fuel.

Survive the longest and gain the highest score!

Good luck soldier!

Small project i made. I challenge myself to program game from start to finish, making everything by myself.

Controls:

WSAD - Movement

Left Mouse Click - Fire

Esc - Pause
